ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 1112
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Shadow, First of all my apologis, I wasn t flaming you or anything. It did sound that way huh? It s cool you were able to get PL d by a player who was
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Shadow,
First of all my apologis, I wasn't flaming you or anything. It did
sound that way huh? It's cool you were able to get PL'd by a player who
was willing to sit that long and do it for nothing in return. That is
VERY rare. I will admit that I am a little sceptical about the being
naked part, you had to have some sort of decent armor on. But again
thats just me, It may actually be possible to do it "naked".
I guess the biggest concern with PL'ing for me is if you are PL'd solo
you don't gain that "group experience". What I mean there is not actual
experience points but how to function in a group. I've had groups where
I've been with PL'd newbs that would just wrecklessly pull at thier whim
(cause thats all they know how to do) and end up nearly killing the
entire group because they wouldn't respect the puller or the group and
want that "high" from geting all that exp so fast. Im refering to the
rush one gets from being PL'd solo and then seeing how fast they level
vs. the speed they level at while in a group. It's a much different
feeling.

Durgaa

EverQuest@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Message: 3
> Date: Wed, 22 Dec 2004 21:16:03 -0000
> From: "shadow_4unme" <shadow_4unme@...>

> some one to do so. Iam an experinced player, and know how where and
> when. As a rogue iam grp dependent on groups yet i can still solo.
> only by knowledge and bandaids lot of bandaids. if your a casual
